meanings.definition: Having a large and heavy build
meanings.sent1: The wrestler looked hulkier than the other athletes.
meanings.sent2: The elephant is hulkier than the giraffe.
meanings.sent3: The tiny kitten tried to imitate the hulkier lion's roar.
meanings.sent4: The old tree stood hulkier than the new saplings around it.
meanings.sent5: The storm clouds grew hulkier as they approached.

meanings.definition: More massive or bulky than usual
meanings.sent1: The hulkier suitcase was difficult to carry up the stairs.
meanings.sent2: The snowman became hulkier as more snow was added.
meanings.sent3: The cake looked hulkier than expected after adding extra frosting.
meanings.sent4: The traffic jam grew hulkier with each passing minute.
meanings.sent5: The pile of books on the desk seemed hulkier than it actually was.
